snippet: The Rangers’ hopes of heading into the playoffs on a high note — and securing the best overall record — were thoroughly dashed by the Capitals at Madison Square Garden on Saturday.
abstract: Washington Capitals best the New York Rangers, 4-1, in NHL action.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ hopes of heading into the playoffs on a high note — and securing the best overall record — were thoroughly dashed by the Capitals at Madison Square Garden on Saturday.

headline.seo: Capitals Defeat Rangers; Presidents’ Trophy in Doubt
headline.main: Rangers, With Eye on Top Spot in League, Fall Flat at the Finish Line
headline.print_headline: Rangers, With Eye on the Top Spot in the League, Fall Flat at the Finish Line
